The HALIFAX COUNTY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS 338A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Eileen O'Connor, Attorney at Law, Allen Buansi, Attorney at Law, for Silver, LaTonya, et al.

Ricky Watson, Jr., Co-Director of Youth Justice Project, Peggy Nicholson, Attorney at Law, Jennifer Story, Attorney at Law, for Children's Law Clinic at Duke Law School, et al.

Seth Ascher.

Jennifer W. Marsh, Director of Research.

Jane Wettach, Attorney at Law, Celia Pistolis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Aisha Oni Forte, Attorney at Law, for Children's Law Clinic at Duke Law School, et al. S. Luke Largess, Attorney at Law, Cheyenne Chambers, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

George Hausen, Jr., Legal Aid.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of December 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 7th day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
